00080 inline int CInteractiveViewLayer::GetKeysState() const
00081 {
00082        const IShapeView* viewPtr = GetViewPtr();
00083        Q_ASSERT(viewPtr != NULL);
00084 
00085        return viewPtr->GetKeysState();
00086 }

00089 inline int CInteractiveViewLayer::GetEditMode() const
